body: Hey, this is just a chilled chat were everyone can share there best memories on/of avicus :D
body_tagged: Hey, this is just a chilled chat were everyone can share there best memories on/of avicus :D
title: Best Avicus Memories!!

replies.body:
Trying to fight Dylan on Clay Wars with sessp.
That damn guy kept tunnelling every time after he killed me, I could never find him and he'd pop up out of nowhere and backstab me time and time again.

Oh and I met Sess for the first time so that just made the moment even better.
replies.body_tagged:
Trying to fight Dylan on Clay Wars with sessp.
That damn guy kept tunnelling every time after he killed me, I could never find him and he'd pop up out of nowhere and backstab me time and time again.

Oh and I met Sess for the first time so that just made the moment even better.

replies.body:
Logging on every day to play Nexus when there were at least 10 people on the gamemode and it wasn't removed. Curse you, devs!

Logging on to play Halycon, my favourite map and the first one I ever played on Avicus. =D

So many memories...
replies.body_tagged:
Logging on every day to play Nexus when there were at least 10 people on the gamemode and it wasn't removed. Curse you, devs!

Logging on to play Halycon, my favourite map and the first one I ever played on Avicus. =D

So many memories...

replies.body:
If it wasn't for Eric, these things wouldn't have happened :

-Getting into ApoLLo.
-Becoming builder.
-Building in general.
-Making more friends.
-Stopping me from quitting (I was thinking of quitting around the time before I became friends with Eric.
-Becoming better at defending by joining ApoLLo.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: When I broke the 5th, remaining monument on Quintus and the defenders Jotrexwiz and HaloGuardian didn't notice lol. I was just standing there breaking it while they were building their defense. Another memory, of course, was when I got asked if I wanted to be Junr Moderator, which was something that I didn't expect to get.
replies.body_tagged: When I broke the 5th, remaining monument on Quintus and the defenders Jotrexwiz and HaloGuardian didn't notice lol. I was just standing there breaking it while they were building their defense. Another memory, of course, was when I got asked if I wanted to be Junr Moderator, which was something that I didn't expect to get.

replies.body:
The first person i talked to 4lextr xd
-Quintes 
(Receives message): "from 4lextr: Wanna swap armor on the back left monument"
=Gets to the back left monument and meets.
Puts purple armor in chest and revives cyan armor
-repeats many times...
the end
